text: Miguel Ángel Rodríguez Orejuela (born August 15, 1943)Los Jinetes de la Cocaína (Spanish). Chapter 3 is a convicted Colombian drug lord. He was one of the leaders of the Cali Cartel. He is the younger brother of Gilberto Rodríguez Orejuela. On March 11, 2005, Rodriguez Orejuela was extradited to the United States. On September 26, 2006, Rodríguez Orejuela was sentenced to 30 years in prison, after pleading guilty to charges of conspiring to import cocaine to the U.S. He is in a Pennsylvania prison. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:Colombian criminals Category:Drug dealers
title: Miguel Rodríguez Orejuela
